survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered In-Home Fitness Coaching Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with AI-powered in-home fitness coaching services, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered in-home fitness coaching service?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered in-home fitness coaching service?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered fitness coaching service do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections and include an 'Other' option to capture additional features.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered fitness coaching service do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered fitness coaching service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered fitness coaching service?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the AI-powered fitness coaching service per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you use the AI-powered fitness coaching service per week?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered fitness coaching service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered fitness coaching service to a friend or colleague?
